home.title: Diaomao
home.banner: Ship Faster | Charge Smarter | Scale Fearlessly
home.webTitle: Diaomao – The Ultimate AI SaaS Starter Kit with Stripe, Credits & Docs
home.webDescription: Next.js 14 + Prisma + PostgreSQL + Stripe + Clerk + Fumadocs. Production-ready pricing tiers, credit system, anonymous-to-auth onboarding, and beautiful docs — everything you need to launch and monetize your AI product in days, not months.
home.keywords: AI SaaS template, Next.js boilerplate, Stripe billing, credit-based pricing, anonymous onboarding, Fumadocs, Prisma PostgreSQL, Clerk authentication

hero.mainTitle: Ship a paid AI product with
hero.description: Pricing that upgrades itself. Credits that never leak. Docs that stay in sync. Stripe flows that just work. Diaomao is the full-stack chassis trusted by makers who refuse to waste another weekend on billing infrastructure.
hero.about: SSR-first • Mobile-perfected • Fingerprint → Clerk seamless onboarding
hero.heroImageAlt: Diaomao – Modern pricing, credit dashboard and documentation system

usage.title: From zero to paid users
usage.description: Everything is pre-wired. You just turn the knobs.

steps.title: Connect your stack
steps.description: Drop in Stripe, PostgreSQL, and Clerk keys. Your pricing page and credit system instantly become user-aware on day one.

steps.title: Tune your config
steps.description: Switch between monthly, yearly, and one-time credit packs with a single config flag. Upgrade paths, discounts, and CTAs auto-adapt to each user.

steps.title: Launch your story
steps.description: Beautiful docs, mega-menu navigation, and gradient-rich marketing pages — all driven by the same MDX files. Ship updates without touching CSS.

items.question: What exactly is Diaomao?
items.answer: The fastest way to launch a production-ready, monetized AI product. Next.js 14 + Prisma + PostgreSQL + Stripe + Clerk + beautiful docs — everything pre-built and battle-tested.

items.question: Can I sell both subscriptions AND one-time credit packs?
items.answer: Absolutely. Toggle between monthly, yearly, and one-time purchases with a single config change. Upgrade buttons automatically route to Stripe Checkout or Customer Portal.

items.question: What happens to anonymous users?
items.answer: They get a fingerprint ID and starter credits instantly. When they eventually sign in, their balance and history merge seamlessly — zero data loss, zero flicker.

items.question: How hard is it to customize navigation & docs?
items.answer: Dead easy. Mega-menu, mobile pinning, and docs are all driven by simple JSON/MDX config. Change once, updates everywhere.

items.question: Is the entire Stripe lifecycle handled?
items.answer: Yes. Checkout, Portal, webhooks, renewals, dunning, refunds, upgrades/downgrades — all idempotent and logged. You’ll never lose a payment event again.

moneyPrice.subtitle: Select the best option for your needs

features.tooltip: 24/7 priority support with dedicated account manager

features.title: Everything you keep rebuilding
features.description: Stop gluing together half-baked solutions. This is the template that ends the weekend billing nightmares.

items.title: Money Price 2.0
items.description: Monthly / Yearly / One-time toggle that instantly reflects the user’s current plan. Discount badges, upgrade guards, and SSR defaults — all automatic.

items.title: Credit System
items.description: Buckets, expiration tags, and smart CTAs. Desktop = modals. Mobile = redirects. Zero confusion, maximum upsells.

items.title: Auth and Anonymous
items.description: Fingerprint on first visit → starter credits → seamless merge on sign-in. No flicker, no balance loss, no support tickets.

items.title: Docs & Navigation
items.description: Fumadocs + mega-menu header. One source of truth for marketing and documentation. Mobile pinning, dark mode, and accessibility included.

tips.title: Tips for Getting the Best Results with

sections.title: Configure before coding
sections.description: Pricing, credits, navigation, and CTAs are config-driven—tune parameters before touching code.

sections.title: Keep billing options
sections.description: Even if you default to onetime, leave monthly/yearly available to avoid dead ends.

sections.title: Honor device behaviors
sections.description: Mobile uses redirects/auth then closes; desktop can modal—follow the design guide.

sections.title: Prefer SSR context
sections.description: Use InitUserContext to prehydrate user state—no first-screen jitter, billing defaults match reality.

sections.title: Follow the schema
sections.description: Stick to Users/Subscriptions/Transactions/Credits; order_id + event.id keep webhooks idempotent.

sections.title: Tell the story in docs
sections.description: Use Fumadocs cards and banners to ship product narrative and releases without extra styling.

seoContent.title: The AI-era product chassis with
seoContent.description: Pricing, credits, docs, navigation, and Stripe orchestrated as one.
seoContent.intro: Diaomao compresses the slowest parts of shipping AI products into one template: Money Price runs subscription/onetime in parallel, Credit Overview governs buckets and CTA matrix, fingerprint-to-Clerk prevents funnel gaps, Stripe lifecycle and schema are pre-aligned, and Fumadocs + Header keep story and navigation consistent.

sections.title: Pricing that adapts to user state
sections.content: Billing pills switch monthly|yearly|onetime; SSR defaults to the user’s plan, and upgrade buttons honor enableSubscriptionUpgrade with Portal fallback.

sections.title: Credits with clear buckets and CTA matrix
sections.content: Buckets, expiry hints, and device-aware actions: desktop modals or auth-to-Portal, mobile redirects or custom handlers.

sections.title: Anonymous-first onboarding
sections.content: Fingerprint issues `fp_xxx`, grants starter credits, and writes records; after login the same context continues with balances and audit intact.

sections.title: Stripe lifecycle baked in
sections.content: Checkout|Portal, async confirmation, renewal, past-due, refund, end-of-period cancel, upgrade|downgrade—all guarded by order_id metadata and webhook idempotency.

sections.title: Navigation and docs that scale
sections.content: Header mega menu, pinned behaviors, and actionOrders keep Docs|pricing|auth buttons in place; Fumadocs cards and banners ship with no extra styling.

sections.title: Schema-first reliability
sections.content: Users, Subscriptions, Credits, Transactions, CreditAuditLog indexed for fingerprint lookup, order routing, and audit stability.

seoContent.conclusion: Plug in keys, tune config, fill copy—launch an AI-ready, revenue-ready, story-ready site in a week.
